reviews.title: False Advertising
reviews.text: Wanted a room for the night near the Sydney airport. The pictures in the website do not depict realty of the rooms. We were given one-room with a total of 5 beds in it. That's about all we had. It is old (tables, bed covers, paint, etc). The bathroom is narrow and you cannot even have two people shoulder to shoulder in it. Ocean-view rooms (are you kidding, we are right in the middle of town). Smells like smoke even when you are in a "non-smoking" room. The busy main street is right below the room we stayed so all the vehicle noise (buses, trucks & loud cars) can be heard through midnight and starts back up at 5 am. If we had known, we would have booked 2 rooms to accomodate family of 5 (3 adults, 1 child, 1 infant) nearby Sydney airport. Cost is outrageous for a 0.5 star hotel (0.5 for free transport to and from airport). Maybe the cost of transport is 75% of the AUD173 charged for a night.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for one night only to cure jet lag following a flight from SFO. It exceeded our expectation. Our twin room cost $135. It was clean, and the room was well maintained. The room, although small met our needs, and reminded us of a small European style family hotel. As other reviewers noted, the airport shuttle was very professionally operated. The front desk was efficient.
reviews.title: Wonderful Airport Hotel Find

reviews.text: The hotel is situated in the middle of what could be Main Street in any small town, with lots of small neighborhood type restaurants and shops (but no clubs, so the street was quiet at night.) The neighborhood felt quite safe.
reviews.title: Excellent service

reviews.text: We would not hesitate to stay at The Gemini Hotel for a longer stay. The Sydney eastern suburb of Radwick is only 15 minutes from downtown Sydney by public transit bus, which stops right outside the door.
reviews.title: Utmost Convenience and Personalized Service

reviews.text: Spent 6 days in the gemini hotel, randwick with 3 other friends.
reviews.title: Suprisingly Spacious
Cheap but not cheerful!
reviews.text: The free airport transport service was professional and courteous. Even when we were departing and accidentally left our wallet in the bus, he made the extra trip back to return it to us at the airport. The hotel staff even went to the nearby cafe to help look for the missing wallet as well. Well done
